ComicInfo.Title: The First Time Ever I Saw the Cat's Face [Episode 14]; The Good, the Cat, and the Ugly [Episode 13]; Cat on a Hot, Tin Supermarket Roof [Episode 12]
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-15 14:38:58. [CVDB121210] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 00:17:23. [Issue ID 262829]
ComicInfo.Characters: Grgur,Cat Claw [Carol Conor],Dr. Sigmund Morse,the Werewolf [Professor Bruce Baker]
ComicInfo.Summary:
The First Time Ever I Saw the Cat's Face [Episode 14]: As Cat Claw battles Grgur, the Werewolf takes a bullet to defend her. Dr. Morse's lab explodes, seemingly killing everyone but Cat Claw, who escapes.
The Good, the Cat, and the Ugly [Episode 13]: Bruce Baker is revealed to be the Werewolf. Dr. Morse kidnaps Carol and Bruce to force Bruce to help him restore Grgur to giant size, but finds that he now has the Werewolf and Cat Claw to deal with.
Cat on a Hot, Tin Supermarket Roof [Episode 12]: Cat Claw defeats the Werewolf and learns his identity.
